author: gstein
msg: * SConstruct:
(): use the correct input (.c files) for the test programs

author: gstein
msg: Enable "scons check". The key is to clone the basic environment into
one for building the test programs. The "check" rule depends on all of
those programs and then runs the new helper "check.sh"
* SConstruct:
(tenv): cloned from the base environment
(...): create build rules for all the test programs, with a special
dependency list for test_all
* build/check.sh: new helper script to run the test suite

author: gstein
msg: On the 1.1.x branch:
Merge the new certificate chain work: r1589..1598

author: gstein
msg: Update the SSL certificate chain callback to provide an indicator of
which certificate in the chain is causing the problem.
Previously, the full chain was provided once at depth=0, and when
individual certificates caused problems, a "chain" with just that
certificate was passed. Now, the full chain is always passed, along
with an always-pass for depth==0.
* serf_bucket_types.h:
(serf_ssl_server_cert_chain_cb_t): add ERROR_DEPTH parameter
* buckets/ssl_buckets.c:
(validate_server_certificate): borrow the chain from the ctx and
build a serf-style chain for it. if we can't borrow it for some
reason, then build a single-cert "chain".
* test/serf_get.c:
(print_certs): update prototype and provide some add'l output

author: gstein
msg: * test/serf_get.c:
(print_certs): add a const to avoid a compiler warning
